node.title: David Cross Releases HITS. You Set the Price.
node.content:
Pay what you want for the new film from writer/director David Cross.

HITS, the new film from comedian/writer/director David Cross, explores fame, delusion, and the impact of social media on society. The movie premiered last night in a series of pay-what-you-want screenings across the US. Today, you can name your price to unlock the full film (plus extras) on BitTorrent Bundle.

The pay-what-you-want Bundle will be available for the next two weeks. Stream it. Download it. Share it. And support the filmmaker directly, with a minimum contribution of $1 (this covers credit card fees and payment processing). For more from HITS, check out the preview Bundle here.

David Cross: HITS

15 HITS Gallery (Art)

About BitTorrent Bundle

BitTorrent Bundle is a publishing project made with and for the world’s creative community. Our mission is to help artists connect directly with fans, inside the content they share.

Each BitTorrent Bundle allows artists to distribute content directly to the Internet. And each Bundle comes with a key. Fans can unlock artist content with an email address, or a direct payment to the artist. The idea is to make each song a storefront, and each file more valuable, every time it’s shared. Got ideas for the next BitTorrent Bundle? Hit us up.
